an6.6:4.1: “Chahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhadro assājānīyo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo, rañño aṅgantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
an6.6:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño bhadro assājānīyo khamo hoti rūpānaṃ, khamo saddānaṃ, khamo gandhānaṃ, khamo rasānaṃ, khamo phoṭṭhabbānaṃ, balasampanno ca hoti.
an6.6:4.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhadro assājānīyo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo, rañño aṅgantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
an6.6:5.1: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo … pe …
an6.6:5.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khamo hoti rūpānaṃ … pe …
an6.6:5.6: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti … pe …
